DOC.brief_summary: This prospective cross sectional study assess feasibility school base health centre ( SBHC ) Sprucecourt Public School , inner-city elementary school Toronto . The SBHC allow inner-city child face barrier access health care opportunity receive health care school.The primary aim study determine utilization SBHC . Establishing feasibility SBHC would support development expansion program inner city school .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study Model School Pediatric Health Initiative Pilot Project
DOC.detailed_description: A chart review first year SBHC conduct . Feasibility metric include number child enrol SBHC . Efficacy metric include proportion enrol child enrol SBHC . Efficacy metric include proportion enrol child attend receive new diagnosis treatment plan
DOC.criteria: All student Sprucecourt Public School surround fourteen school , well sibling ( age 012 year ) , enrol consent attend SBHC All infants preschool age child attend onsite Parenting Family Literacy Centre enrol SBHC
